Description.UIName: Permanent Contract for Krupp BA Airdrop
Description.Name: Permanent Contract for Krupp BA Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your friendship with The Free Rasalhague Republic, they have offered you a permanent contract with a squad of their Krupp Battle Armor. Purchasing this contract will permit the option to field Krupp Battle Armor using a Battle Armor Airdrop. This contract is permanent and does not expire. Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
